amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike subsection (b) of Section 3, which would to allow EPA to consider technological feasibility when determining what level of pollution is safe.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 115-229 to strike subsection (b) of Section 3, which would to allow EPA to consider technological feasibility when determining what level of pollution is safe.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 241 (Roll no. 386).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Tonko.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
